comments.text:
As part of the work on bug 1630980, I've discovered that mail.com has the wrong engine name.

Additionally, we need qwantjr as a separate engine as otherwise we can't set the defaults for the Qwant distribution correctly. I'd like to land this engine separately to the main patch, so that QA can test the configuration updates properly before we publish them.
comments.raw_text:
As part of the work on bug 1630980, I've discovered that mail.com has the wrong engine name.

Additionally, we need qwantjr as a separate engine as otherwise we can't set the defaults for the Qwant distribution correctly. I'd like to land this engine separately to the main patch, so that QA can test the configuration updates properly before we publish them.
comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
We need this to enable the modern search configuration to specify only qwant as the default engine. With the two listed in one WebExtension we can't distinguish between locales for the default engine.

Bug 1630980 will remove the old junior locale from the qwant engine.
comments.text:
Created attachment 9143923
Bug 1633705 - Add qwantjr as a separate WebExtension. r?daleharvey!


We need this to enable the modern search configuration to specify only qwant as the default engine. With the two listed in one WebExtension we can't distinguish between locales for the default engine.

Bug 1630980 will remove the old junior locale from the qwant engine.
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
